T02D1447:292b-1: shr'i tsakra samba ra ho ma bi dhi:/
T02D1447:293a-1: 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga / bcom ldan
T02D1447:293a-2: 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D1447:293a-3: // sngo ser dmar po ma rka ta ljang gu'i sku 'chang spyan gsum can //
T02D1447:293a-4: dbang chen la sogs phyogs bzhi'i zhal mnga' shes rab dmar spyan gsum /
T02D1447:293a-5: phyag gnyis bgegs kyi lpags 'dzin rdo rje dril bu gnyis na 'chang //
T02D1447:293a-6: phyag gzhan phyag mtshan brgyad po 'dzin pa bde ba mchog gis srungs //
T02D1447:293a-7: thog mar bde mchog 'khor lo yi //
T02D1447:293a-8: rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud las ni //
T02D1447:293a-9: sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir //
T02D1447:293a-10: sbyin sreg rim pa bdag gis bshad //
T02D1447:293a-11: dkyil 'khor dag ni sgrub dus su //
T02D1447:293a-12: sbyin sreg gis ni tshim par byas //
T02D1447:293a-13: gsang sngags ma bzlas mi 'grub la //
T02D1447:293a-15: las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D1447:293a-16: sbyin sreg las rnams brtsam par bya //
T02D1447:293a-17: sbyin sreg las rnams med pa las //
T02D1447:293a-19: de bas 'dir ni sngags pa yis //
T02D1447:293a-20: brtson pas sbyin sreg las rnams bya //
T02D1447:293a-21: bla med nang dang phyi yi ste //
T02D1447:293a-22: sbyin sreg dag ni gsum du 'dod //
T02D1447:293a-23: gzhan dag zhi ba la sogs la //
T02D1447:293a-24: sbyin sreg dag ni bzhi ru 'dod //
T02D1447:293a-25: de la bla na med pa dang por brjod bar bya ste ;
T02D1447:293a-26: / rnam rtog med pa'i sems nyid ni //
T02D1447:293a-27: thab khung sgra yi mtshan ma dag / rnam dben me yi dbus su ni //
T02D1447:293a-28: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga //
T02D1447:293a-29: sems las byung ba ma lus pa'i //
T02D1447:293a-30: yam shing dag gi sreg blugs bya //
T02D1447:293a-31: gzugs la sogs pa'i 'byung ba rnams //
T02D1447:293a-32: yam shing du ni rab grags yin //
T02D1447:293a-33: padma thab khung yin par bshad //
T02D1447:293a-34: rdo rje blugs gzar yin par grags //
T02D1447:293a-35: rtag tu sa bon sreg blugs kyis //
T02D1447:293a-36: bla med gnas ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D1447:293a-37: bla med rjes su sbyor ba yis //
T02D1447:293a-38: phung po la sogs bud shing bsregs //
T02D1447:293a-39: ye shes me ni skyes gyur pas //
T02D1447:293a-40: phyi rol bsreg pa bdag med yin //
T02D1447:293a-41: dzny'a na b'a da bas bshad pa //
T02D1447:293a-42: sbyin sreg cho ga phyi rim pa //
T02D1447:293a-43: sems dang sems byung dag yin te //
T02D1447:293a-44: phung po la sogs bud shing bsregs //
T02D1447:293a-46: sems kyis ji tsam bsams pa dag /
T02D1447:293b-0: @293b phyi rol sbyin sreg yin par 'dod //
T02D1447:293b-1: ye shes me la phung po yi //
T02D1447:293b-2: yam shing sreg pa bla med yin //
T02D1447:293b-3: de nas yang nang gi brjod par bya ste /
T02D1447:293b-4: nyon mongs sel ba zhi byed yin //
T02D1447:293b-5: ting nge 'dzin ni rgyas byed phyir //
T02D1447:293b-6: rang gi lha yi sbyor bas bdag / ji lta bar ni sems kyis bya //
T02D1447:293b-7: skye ba'i las las rnam grol zhing //
T02D1447:293b-8: tshe ni yang dag 'phel ba'i phyir //
T02D1447:293b-9: ci 'dod sreg blugs las bya ba //
T02D1447:293b-10: nang gi sbyin sreg dag tu bshad //
T02D1447:293b-11: ji ltar dus bzhi'i rim pa yis //
T02D1447:293b-12: sbyin sreg bzhi yang rab tu bshad //
T02D1447:293b-13: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
T02D1447:293b-14: dbang dang mngon spyod shes par bya //
T02D1447:293b-15: sdig pa 'jig phyir zhi ba ste ;
T02D1447:293b-16: / bsod nams yongs 'dzin rgyas pa yin //
T02D1447:293b-17: chags pa bsgom phyir dbang 'gyur te //
T02D1447:293b-18: rtog bzad phyir gsod pa yin //
T02D1447:293b-19: de nas yang phyi'i bshad pa bya ste /
T02D1447:293b-20: rgyud so so las slob dpon tha dad pas sbyin sreg gi cho ga ji skad bshad par bya /
T02D1447:293b-21: 'di ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las bstan te ;
T02D1447:293b-22: bdag gis 'khor lo sdom pa'i man ngag cung zad tsam brjod par bya'o //
T02D1447:293b-24: sems can dbye bas mtha' yas te //
T02D1447:293b-25: rigs kyi dbye bas lnga ru 'gyur //
T02D1447:293b-26: las kyi dbye bas bzhi ru 'gyur //
T02D1447:293b-27: thab khung rnams ni de ltar bshad //
T02D1447:293b-28: zhi ba la ni zlum la dkar //
T02D1447:293b-29: rgyas la ser po dbang chen te //
T02D1447:293b-30: dbang la dmar po gru gsum pa //
T02D1447:293b-31: mngon spyod zla ba phyed pa yin //
T02D1447:293b-32: khru gang tshad nas brtsams nas ni //
T02D1447:293b-33: khru ni bcu drug pa yi bar //
T02D1447:293b-34: de yi tshad du brkos nas ni //
T02D1447:293b-35: rang gi tshad du bya ba yin //
T02D1447:293b-36: khru gang tshad kyi thab khung la //
T02D1447:293b-37: sor bzhi dor bar kha khyer sor bzhis bstod //
T02D1447:293b-38: khru phyed brkos la de bzhin du //
T02D1447:293b-39: thams cad la yang blta bya ste //
T02D1447:293b-40: kun kyang rang gi kha khyer du bya'o //
T02D1447:293b-41: thab khung gi dbus su rdo rje dang zangs gri bri'o //
T02D1447:293b-42: thab khung gi nang du phyogs bzhir kha tv'am ga dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams bri'o //
T02D1447:293b-43: kha khyer la padma'i steng du zangs gri'i phreng ba ;
T02D1447:293b-44: thab kyi phyi rol du gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi par dkyil 'khor gyi thig btab ste /
T02D1447:293b-45: 'khor lo gsum byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1447:293b-47: dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa /
T02D1447:293b-48: ji ltar 'khor lo gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag mtshan bzhin du 'dir yang de ltar blta'o //
T02D1447:294a-1: la sogs par lcags kyu la sogs mtshan par bya'o //
T02D1447:294a-3: padma nags kyi lcug ma dang //
T02D1447:294a-4: phreng ba dang ni spyi blugs dang //
T02D1447:294a-5: ri dags pags pa mdung rtse gsum //
T02D1447:294a-6: zla ba phyed pa rgyal mtshan dang //
T02D1447:294a-7: ral ba'i tshogs dang mig dang ni //
T02D1447:294a-8: 'khor lo dung dang dbyug pa dang //
T02D1447:294a-9: ral gri phub dang mdung dang ni //
T02D1447:294a-10: dril bu ba dan rma bya dang //
T02D1447:294a-11: ra skyes lnga lnga byas nas ni //
T02D1447:294a-12: shar phyogs snam bu dag la bri //
T02D1447:294a-13: de ltar thab thams cad byas nas //
T02D1447:294a-14: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha khyer bya'o //
T02D1447:294a-15: zhi ba la ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'am /
T02D1447:294a-17: rgyas pa la ni rin po ches mtshan pa /
T02D1447:294a-18: dbang la ni padmas mtshan pa /
T02D1447:294a-19: drag po la ni rtse gsum pas mtshan pa ste /
T02D1447:294a-20: 'di ltar las dang rjes su mthun par rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa'i kha khyer bya'o //
T02D1447:294a-21: shar du zhi ba bya bar bshad //
T02D1447:294a-22: lho phyogs su ni rgyas pa ste //
T02D1447:294a-23: dbang gi las ni nub tu bshad //
T02D1447:294a-24: gsad pa byang du bya ba yin //
T02D1447:294a-25: ji ltar las dang rjes mthun par //
T02D1447:294a-26: rdul tshon gyis ni rdzogs par bri //
T02D1447:294a-27: yang na me tog dag kyang rung //
T02D1447:294a-28: thab khung dag ni de ltar bya //
T02D1447:294a-29: yam shing bud shing rdzas la sogs //
T02D1447:294a-30: mtshan nyid me yi rtags rnams ni //
T02D1447:294a-31: gzhan du rgya cher bshad pas na ;
T02D1447:294a-32: /'dir ni bdag gis ma bsgrags so //
T02D1447:294a-33: man ngag gcig pu'i rim pa dag / rnal 'byor rgyud las grags pa rnams //
T02D1447:294a-34: mdor bsdus nas ni nges par yang //
T02D1447:294a-35: ji tsam nus pa bshad par bya //
T02D1447:294a-36: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus khrus byas te //
T02D1447:294a-40: thal ba bsres pas lus byugs te /
T02D1447:294a-41: ji skad bshad pa'i rgyan bgo bar bya ste /
T02D1447:294a-42: stag gi pags pa bgos shing //
T02D1447:294a-44: na ra'i rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pas sems can gyi don rtag tu bya'o //
T02D1447:294a-45: phyi rol bzlog tshul 'chang ba ni //
T02D1447:294a-46: de ni zhi sogs las rnams la //
T02D1447:294a-47: thugs ni zhi bar shes par bya //
T02D1447:294a-48: nyi mas gdungs pa'i rgya mtsho cha //
T02D1447:294a-49: gangs ltar nang grang phyi rol tsha //
T02D1447:294a-50: thugs rje chen po'i khro bo yis //
T02D1447:294b-0: de ltar bu'i las dang rjes su mthun par gos kyi bye brag bgo bar @294b bya'o //
T02D1447:294b-1: de ni sgrub pa po'i las so //
T02D1447:294b-2: de nas rang gi lha'i nga rgyal bskyed de /
T02D1447:294b-3: ji ltar bshad pa'i las dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs su byas la /
T02D1447:294b-4: zhal bzhi pa dang sku gsung thugs kyi phur bu'i sngags dang /
T02D1447:294b-5: de bzhin du gsal byed ni ra ksha raksha dang /
T02D1447:294b-6: h'um gsum dang phat ni brjod par bya'o //
T02D1447:294b-7: gsang sngags de las khro bo la sogs pa spros te /
T02D1447:294b-8: bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad bsreg par byas nas /
T02D1447:294b-9: thal ba dang bgegs rnams bsregs te /
T02D1447:294b-10: phyogs bcur byer bar bsam mo //
T02D1447:294b-11: de bzhin du g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i stang stabs kyang bya'o //
T02D1447:294b-12: 'di ltar bgegs kyi tshogs rnams phur bu dang /
T02D1447:294b-14: ra ba la sogs pas thab khung gi thon khor bgegs med par bya ste /
T02D1447:294b-15: thab khung byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o //
T02D1447:294b-16: yi ge h'um ngam rang gi lha'i tshogs kyi yi
T02D1447:294b-17: ge gang yang rung pa las dang rjes su mthun
T02D1447:294b-18: pa las thab khung bskyed la /
T02D1447:294b-19: de'i dbus lte ba la yi ge re pha 'bar
T02D1447:294b-20: ba yongs su gyur pa las gru gsum par byas
T02D1447:294b-21: shing bsgoms la / de'i grva gsum la aom a'a: h'um yi ge gsum gyis 'dod pa dang /
T02D1447:294b-23: gzugs med pa'i khams gsum sa 'og dang sa bla
T02D1447:294b-24: mtho ris kyi gzugs padma dang 'khor lo dang rdo
T02D1447:294b-26: dbus su re pha 'bar ba yongs su gyur pa mthong ba dang /
T02D1447:294b-27: mtshan ma'i yi ge gsum dang /
T02D1447:294b-28: re pha yongs su gyur pa las 'bar ba'i dbus
T02D1447:294b-29: su chu'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa la khams gsum gyi
T02D1447:294b-30: bdag po dpal khrag 'thung bar spros te /
T02D1447:294b-31: zhi ba'i don du p'a pa ka'i me bsgoms la zhi ba'i gzugs can dkar po zhal gcig pa /
T02D1447:294b-34: ral ba'i cod pan can phyag g-yas pa gnyis na dbyug tho dang /
T02D1447:294b-36: g-yon pa na bgrang phreng dang /
T02D1447:294b-38: rgyan dang gos dkar po bsnams pa //
T02D1447:294b-40: lus thams cad la bdud rtsi dkar po'i rgyun 'bab pa /
T02D1447:294b-41: ral pa la mkha' 'gro ma gnas par bsgom mo //
T02D1447:294b-42: de bzhin du rgyas pa la ni khyad par du mdog ser po /
T02D1447:294b-44: dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
T02D1447:295a-1: kyi mes sems can thams cad la mchog stsol ba /
T02D1447:295a-2: stobs dang mdog dang dpal rdzogs par mdzad pa cod pan du bsgom mo //
T02D1447:295a-3: rim pa gzhan yang dbang dang dgug pa la 'dod
T02D1447:295a-4: pa'i med mar po me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa
T02D1447:295a-6: khanda ro ha cod pan la gnas pa /
T02D1447:295a-7: khyad par du g-yas g-yon na lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1447:295a-8: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1447:295a-9: gsad pa la rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa
T02D1447:295a-10: mdog nag po 'jigs pa spyan zlum po h'um gi
T02D1447:295a-11: sa bon las skyes pa gos dang rgyan nag po
T02D1447:295a-12: mi rus kyi phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D1447:295a-13: zla phyed lta bur 'bar ba'i dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1447:295a-14: gzugs can ma'i cod pan can //
T02D1447:295a-16: 'jigs byed chen po nag po 'bar ba las bya rgod dang khra la sogs pas /
T02D1447:295a-17: nam mkha' khyab par bkug ste /
T02D1447:295a-18: gang dang gang byas pa de zos par bsgom mo ;
T02D1447:295a-19: / rlung gi mes ni gsad pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o //
T02D1447:295a-21: de la zhi ba la ni 'o ma can gyi shing las byung ba'i me'am /
T02D1447:295a-23: bram ze tha ma'i mes bya'o //
T02D1447:295a-24: rgyas pa la ni rgyal po dang /
T02D1447:295a-27: rgyal rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'i mes bya'o //
T02D1447:295a-28: dbang la ni smad 'tshong ma dang /
T02D1447:295a-29: rje'u rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'i mes bya'o //
T02D1447:295a-30: dgug pa la ni gar mkhan dang /
T02D1447:295a-32: lam du bus pa'i mes bya'o //
T02D1447:295a-33: gsod pa la ni rdo las byung ba'i me'am /
T02D1447:295a-34: gdol ba'i khyim nas byung ba'i mes bya'o //
T02D1447:295a-35: thams cad kyang dur khrod kyi me dang /
T02D1447:295a-36: dur khrod kyi sol bar ldan par bya'o //
T02D1447:295a-38: de nas mchod yon snod gnyis ni //
T02D1447:295a-39: ma chag sdug cing mdzes pa la /
T02D1447:295a-40: chang ngam yang na sbyar ba'i chang //
T02D1447:295a-41: me tog ldan pas dgang bar bya //
T02D1447:295a-42: de la bdud rtsi lnga po yis //
T02D1447:295a-43: gnyis ka yang ni blug par bya //
T02D1447:295a-44: ye ge bdun pa gcig bu dang //
T02D1447:295a-45: gnyis pa gnod mdzes rgyal po dag / gcig ni brgya rtsa brgyad pa ste //
T02D1447:295a-46: gnyis pa dag ni bzhi cha yin //
T02D1447:295a-47: gnas la legs par bzhag nas su //
T02D1447:295a-48: gos kyis bkab ste mchod par bya //
T02D1447:295a-49: mchod yon gyi snod kyi cho ga'o //
T02D1447:295b-0: sbyin @295b sreg yo byad thams cad kun //
T02D1447:295b-1: bdag gi g-yas su dgod par bya //
T02D1447:295b-2: rdo rje de bzhin dril bu dang //
T02D1447:295b-3: mchod yon snod ni g-yon du gzhag / dgang gzar dang ni blugs gzar dang //
T02D1447:295b-4: mar ni mdun du gzhag par bya //
T02D1447:295b-5: thams cad kyang ni bsangs nas gzhag /'di ni rdzas gzhag pa'o //
T02D1447:295b-6: de nas phyi rol gyi me blangs la /
T02D1447:295b-7: gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyis ku sha blangs te //
T02D1447:295b-8: de'i chus lan gsum bsangs la /
T02D1447:295b-9: rtsva skam po gtsang ma dang bcas pas dag par byas te /
T02D1447:295b-10: bdud rtsi lngas bsres te thab khung du bzhag ste /
T02D1447:295b-11: aom shr'i he ru ka ma h'a badzra dzva la h'um h'um /
T02D1447:295b-12: gsang sngags 'di dang bcas par rlung g-yab kyis g-yab ste thab tu me sbar ro //
T02D1447:295b-13: de'i dbus su dam tshig sems dpa'i me sngar bshad pa'i rnam par bsams te /
T02D1447:295b-14: ye shes sems dpa'i me sngags dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya 'dis spyan drangs te /
T02D1447:295b-15: lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs par byas la /
T02D1447:295b-16: mthe bong srin lag gi tshigs la bkug pa'i thabs kyis spyan drang ngo //
T02D1447:295b-17: ae hye hi ma h'a bh'u ta de ba ri
T02D1447:295b-18: shi dvi dza satva ma gri hi tva yu dham
T02D1447:295b-19: ma h'a rasmi aa sminsanni hi to bha ba /
T02D1447:295b-20: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra p'a ba ka
T02D1447:295b-21: / aagna ye ma ma sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a
T02D1447:295b-23: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra ma hendra /
T02D1447:295b-24: aagna ye ma ma pushtim ku ru boo sha taa rgyas pa'i'o //
T02D1447:295b-25: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra k'a ma aagna
T02D1447:295b-26: ye ma ma a'a mu kam ba shim ku ru
T02D1447:295b-28: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra kro dha aagna
T02D1447:295b-29: ye dza hi kro dha ya h'um aa mu kam
T02D1447:295b-32: me lha 'ongs pa dang mther 'thung dang nye reg
T02D1447:295b-33: byas te bkug la dam tshig gi me lha la
T02D1447:295b-34: gzhug go // de nas mchod yon gyi snong blangs
T02D1447:295b-35: la bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres te thugs ka nas
T02D1447:295b-37: aom shr'i he ru ka ma h'a badzra pra w'a ra satk'a ram pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:295b-38: de nas lag pa gnyis kyis lan gsum aargha 'di dbul te /
T02D1447:295b-39: aom ma h'a ma ma ya tad ma grihna siddhimme pra yatstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:295b-41: de nas 'khor lo gsum byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1447:295b-42: aom a'a: h'um mgo bo dang mgrin pa dang snying ga rnams su'o //
T02D1447:295b-43: de nas yan lag drug tu dgod par bya'o //
T02D1447:296a-0: de nas rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas yid kyis dbang @296a * //
T02D1447:296a-2: l'a sya la sogs pa brgyud kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1447:296a-3: dar dpyangs dang phreng ba la sogs pa bcings te go bskon no //
T02D1447:296a-4: de nas me long dang sman la sogs pa khrus kyi yo byad dang /
T02D1447:296a-5: dril bu dkrol zhing spos dang rdzas snga ma dang
T02D1447:296a-6: bcas pa la yi ge brgya pa bzlas te khrus
T02D1447:296a-7: bya'o // yi ge brgya pa 'di dag ste /
T02D1447:296a-8: aom he ru ka badzra sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1447:296a-9: de nas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi'i gsang sngags dang /
T02D1447:296a-10: yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi gsang sngags kyis btab pa'i bum pa lngas dbang bskur ro //
T02D1447:296a-11: zhi ba la ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs can rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan du bsam mo //
T02D1447:296a-12: rgyas pa la ni l'a ma'i tshul can rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan du bsam mo //
T02D1447:296a-13: dbang la ni dum skyes ma'i tshul can snang ba mtha' yas dbu rgyan du bsam mo //
T02D1447:296a-14: gsang pa la ni gzugs can ma'i tshul can don yod grub pa dbu rgyan du bsam mo //
T02D1447:296a-15: me lha'i zhal dang dgang gzar gyi kha la rang
T02D1447:296a-16: gi bdag po'i sa bon gyi yi ge dgod do
T02D1447:296a-17: // de nas aom d'a ki n'i dzi ni dzi ka sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:296a-18: 'dis mar la mngon bar bsngags te /
T02D1447:296a-19: de bzhin du rgyas pa la yang l'a ma dang
T02D1447:296a-20: rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa'i sngags kyis gdab
T02D1447:296a-21: bo // de ltar me 'bar bar shes nas thog mar blugs gzar gyis dgang blugs gsum /
T02D1447:296a-22: aom shr'i he ru ka dzva la dzva la h'um sngags 'di dang bcas par dbul lo //
T02D1447:296a-23: de nas me 'bar ba dang mdog dang sgra la sogs pa las bgegs med par shes nas /
T02D1447:296a-24: bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs bzhi nas ku sha dgram mo //
T02D1447:296a-25: aom ai me ku sha shu bha dib bya su ra brahma pa bi ta /
T02D1447:296a-26: tri na ratna tra ya ra ta hi dhi pri thi bi dza garbha /
T02D1447:296a-27: aa bighnam ma ma sh'antim ku ru bantu sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:296a-28: 'di lta bu'i rim pas rtsa ba dang bcas par phyung ste /
T02D1447:296a-29: mdog ljang gu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sbyor ro //
T02D1447:296a-30: gzhan rnams la ni mnyam par gcad par bya'o //
T02D1447:296a-31: me'i rim pa ni shar ni shar gyi mdun nas te /
T02D1447:296a-32: lho ni lho'i mdun nas so //
T02D1447:296a-33: nub ni nub kyi mdun nas so //
T02D1447:296a-34: byang ni byang gi mdun nas so //
T02D1447:296b-0: me thab kyi sa phyogs kun du @296b zhal bzhi
T02D1447:296b-1: pa'i sngags kyis mchod yon gyi snod la bsngags te
T02D1447:296b-2: bsang ngo // de nas zhal bzhi pa'i sngags sam //
T02D1447:296b-3: khanda ro ha'i gsang sngags gang yang rung bas mda' dang tshon skud la btab ste /
T02D1447:296b-4: mda' bzhi phyogs mtshams su btsugs la sna lnga'i skud
T02D1447:296b-5: pas yongs su bskor na rdo rje'i bcing ba byas
T02D1447:296b-6: par 'gyur ro // ku sha la sogs pa dgram pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1447:296b-7: de nas me'i las dang rjes su mthun par dngul gyi snod dam /
T02D1447:296b-8: padma'i snod gang yang rung ba mdun du bsams te /
T02D1447:296b-9: yang mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang /
T02D1447:296b-10: 'thor 'thung byin la dgad blugs dbul lo //
T02D1447:296b-11: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1447:296b-12: pus mo gnyis kyi nang du lag pa bzhag ste /
T02D1447:296b-13: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis dgang gzar blangs la /
T02D1447:296b-14: mthe bong dang mthe'u chung brtan par bzung ste /
T02D1447:296b-15: sor mo lhag ma rnams yu ba'i steng du bzhag
T02D1447:296b-16: la mar gyis yangs su bkang ba'i dgang blugs bdun
T02D1447:296b-17: nam gsum mam gcig me lha'i sngags kyis me lha'i
T02D1447:296b-19: aom he ru ka aagna ye aa mu ka sya sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:296b-20: de bzhin du thams cad la yang sbyar ro //
T02D1447:296b-21: de nas bsreg pa'i rim pa blta bar bya ste /
T02D1447:296b-23: de nas yam shing ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D1447:296b-25: de nas til dang 'bras chan dang /
T02D1447:296b-27: de nas ku sha dang d'ur ba'i myu gu ni spyi gtsug la'o //
T02D1447:296b-28: de nas nas dang gro dang 'bras dang mon sran gre'u rnams ni zhal la'o //
T02D1447:296b-29: de bzhin du zhi ba'i rdzas la sogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no //
T02D1447:296b-34: mchod yon dang 'thor 'thung ni phyag la'o //
T02D1447:296b-35: mar me ni mdun du ste /
T02D1447:296b-37: de nas sdig pa bsreg pa'i phyir dang por til gyi sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1447:296b-38: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:296b-39: de nas rdzas thams cad gsang sngags gcig gis bya'o //
T02D1447:296b-40: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dzva
T02D1447:296b-41: la ya sarbba bhismam ku ru sarbba bighn'am h'um phat
T02D1447:296b-42: / aa mo ka sya sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:296b-43: yang na aom he ru k'a ya bid ma he
T02D1447:296b-44: bidy'a r'a dz'a ya dhi ma he tan no b'i
T02D1447:296b-45: ra pa ra dzo ta ya ya h'um /
T02D1447:297a-0: aa mo ka sya sh'antim ku ru sv'a @297a * //
T02D1447:297a-2: yang na rgyud gzhan las bshad pa so so'i spyi'i gsang sngags kyang rung ngo //
T02D1447:297a-3: aom badzra aadzny'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:297a-5: aom aa gna ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:297a-7: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:297a-9: p'a pam da ha na sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:297a-10: til dang yungs kar rnams kyi'o //
T02D1447:297a-11: aom sarbba sam pa de sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:297a-13: aom aa pra ti ha ta badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:297a-15: aom badzra a'a yu: she sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:297a-17: aom ma h'a be g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:297a-19: aom badzra ghasma re sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:297a-21: aom badzra bi dza y'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:297a-23: aom ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:297a-25: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:297a-27: aom ma h'a shr'i bha ya bha ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1447:297a-30: dz'a ti pha la rnams kyi'o //
T02D1447:297a-31: zhu ba'i rdzas lhag ma rnams kyi ni me'i rang gi gsang sngags rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1447:297a-32: au dumw'a ra'i shing gi yal ga la sogs pa lhag ma rnams la ni /
T02D1447:297a-33: aom la sogs pa nas rang gi ming dang mthar sv'a h'a bcas pa'i rim pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1447:297a-34: rdzas thams cad la bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres te /
T02D1447:297a-37: bsang gtor la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1447:297a-38: ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs la /
T02D1447:297a-39: snying ga nas yi ge h'um gi 'od zer gyis bskul nas nam mkha' las bkug ste /
T02D1447:297a-40: las ma lus pa'i gzhi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1447:297a-41: ye shes kyi me lha ji skad bshad pa'i las
T02D1447:297a-42: kyi rgyan dang / na bza' dang /
T02D1447:297a-43: ji skad bshad pa'i mdog dang /
T02D1447:297a-44: phyag ji ltar gnas pa'i dpal khrag 'thung gi gzugs byon pa dang /
T02D1447:297a-45: de'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams dang /
T02D1447:297a-46: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ngo //
T02D1447:297a-48: aom shr'i badzra he ru ka ae hye hi bha ga b'an /
T02D1447:297a-49: ai ha b'akya sa ma ye ma tsa panydza ai
T02D1447:297a-50: mri ta aargham sam pra t'itstsha sva bu tsam bi
T02D1447:297a-52: 'dis thab khung g-yas kyi drung du bltas te /
T02D1447:297a-53: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um
T02D1447:297a-54: phat d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ra sv'a
T02D1447:297a-55: h'a / zhabs bsil dang mchod yon dang /
T02D1447:297a-58: l'a sye la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1447:297b-0: rtsa @297b ba'i sngags brgyad kyis bstod do //
T02D1447:297b-1: rdo rje bcings la lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang /
T02D1447:297b-3: dril bu rnams kyis dgug pa dang /
T02D1447:297b-4: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /
T02D1447:297b-6: dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam
T02D1447:297b-7: sa ma ya ho 'dis me lha'i dam tshig sems
T02D1447:297b-8: dpa'i zhal du thams cad kyi bdag nyid rab tu
T02D1447:297b-9: gzhug go // de ltar snga ma bzhin du me
T02D1447:297b-10: long gi thog tu khrus byas la dbang lnga gsol
T02D1447:297b-11: gzhug go // te / dar dpyangs dang /
T02D1447:297b-13: ye shes sems dpa' rang gi thugs kar mtshan ma'i
T02D1447:297b-14: dbus su rang gi zla tshes kyi yi ge la
T02D1447:297b-15: dkyil 'khor ma lus pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi
T02D1447:297b-16: lha'i rang bzhin mthong ba la yang mchod yon phul
T02D1447:297b-17: te / snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg gi yo byad thams cad bsangs te /
T02D1447:297b-18: de nas dgang gzar blangs la ji tsam nus pa'i dgang blugs me lha'i zhal du dbul lo //
T02D1447:297b-19: de bzhin du blugs gzar gyis stong ngam /
T02D1447:297b-22: bzhi cha yang rung bsreg go //
T02D1447:297b-23: de nas yang dgang blugs gsum dbul te /
T02D1447:297b-24: 'di ltar dkyil 'khor ma lus pa kun la bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1447:297b-25: thams cad la dgang blugs dang spos dang /
T02D1447:297b-26: dril bu'i sgra dang yi ge brgya pa gsum mam gcig bzlas te /
T02D1447:297b-27: me tog la sogs pa dag pa dbul lo //
T02D1447:297b-28: sbyin sreg gi yo byad thams cad kyis snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1447:297b-29: dbyangs skyong gi gsang sngags sam yi ge bdun pa'am /
T02D1447:297b-30: rdo rje phag mo'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngags
T02D1447:297b-31: gang yang rung ba las 'di zhes bya ba sh'antim
T02D1447:297b-33: zhes bya ba mthar gdags so //
T02D1447:297b-34: rgyas pa'i mthar ni pushti bku ru /
T02D1447:297b-35: boo sha ta dbang gi mthar ro //
T02D1447:297b-37: yang dri zhim po las byung ba ci yang rung ste /
T02D1447:297b-38: thams cad bdag gis kha zas la sogs pa 'byor pa'i don du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1447:297b-39: de ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg byas la dngos grub kyi phyir /
T02D1447:297b-40: rgyud las bshad pa'i rdzas rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1447:297b-41: ba lang sha dang rta sha dang /
T02D1447:297b-42: shva na'i sha dang khyim bya dag / dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni //
T02D1447:297b-43: sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig / phyir bzlog phreng ba'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02D1447:297b-44: zhi ba la sogs las rnams bya //
T02D1447:298a-0: rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gnyis @298a * //
T02D1447:298a-2: dgug pa la sogs bya ba yin //
T02D1447:298a-3: de nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i mthar aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1447:298a-4: nye ba'i snying po 'di gsum mam /
T02D1447:298a-5: bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig mar gyi sreg blugs kyis sbar la /
T02D1447:298a-6: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang /
T02D1447:298a-8: dril bu'i rol mo snga ma bzhin du dbul lo //
T02D1447:298a-9: dgang blugs kyi mthar bde legs dang rol mo dang /
T02D1447:298a-10: bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dbul lo //
T02D1447:298a-11: de nas bstod pa bya ste /
T02D1447:298a-12: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol la /
T02D1447:298a-14: rdo rje bcing ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D1447:298a-15: aom he ru ka mu: 'dis steng du dgrol te /
T02D1447:298a-16: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1447:298a-17: ces pa la sogs pa brjod do //
T02D1447:298a-18: de nas aom kha kha kh'a hi zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis nya dang sha dang /
T02D1447:298a-20: zan dron la sogs pas yongs su gang ba'i gtor ma byin no //
T02D1447:298a-21: me'i dbus nas ye shes sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su gyur te gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1447:298a-22: de nas me la mchod yon la sogs pa phul te /
T02D1447:298a-23: sbyin sreg gi yo byad lhag ma rnams kyang sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1447:298a-24: sreg blugs kyi mthar bsgrub bya bzung la dgang blugs dbul lo //
T02D1447:298a-25: mchod yon zhabs bsil dang bsang gtor yang bya /
T02D1447:298a-26: sgrub pa po mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang gsol te /
T02D1447:298a-27: aom aagna ye ya hi ya hi /
T02D1447:298a-28: sarbbam rtse khe pa ra aa tham tsas ti dha ma ga tsa ha phyag byug ces bya'o //
T02D1447:298a-29: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong phyir bskyed
T02D1447:298a-30: pa'i tshul gyis sprul pa'i me 'bar ba'i gzugs can
T02D1447:298a-31: du blta ba de gshegs su gsol te /
T02D1447:298a-32: rang gi lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D1447:298a-33: rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya ba yang lan bdun gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D1447:298a-34: aom badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya /
T02D1447:298a-35: zhes bya bas phyogs kyi phur bu dang /
T02D1447:298a-37: las thams cad pa'i chu 'o ma dang bcas pa khanda ro ha'i rigs sngags kyis btab ste /
T02D1447:298a-39: de nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
T02D1447:298a-40: glu dang gar la sogs pa mdun du bya zhing ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o /
T02D1447:298a-42: // / dpal sdom rnal 'byor ma rgyud las //
T02D1447:298b-0: @298b sbyin sreg rim pa phyung ba 'dis //
T02D1447:298b-1: rnal 'byor ba ni rtag dga' ba'i //
T02D1447:298b-2: dngos grub myur du grub par shog / dpal he ru ka'i ming gi rgyud las /
T02D1447:298b-3: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga
T02D1447:298b-4: grub pa'i slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis
T02D1447:298b-7: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharmma bha dra dang /
T02D1447:298b-8: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rig pa
